The '''[[2008 NFL season|2008]] [[Oakland Raiders]] season''' was the team's forty-ninth season. The Raiders improved upon their 4-12 record from [[2007 Oakland Raiders season|2007]]. This was also be the first time in 4 seasons that the team did not play both contestants from the previous [[Super Bowl]]. In which case they played the [[New England Patriots]], but not the [[New York Giants]]. This was also the first time in 6 seasons the club did not finish 4th in their division, but 3rd instead.
The '''[[2008 NFL season|2008]] [[Oakland Raiders]] season''' was the team's forty-ninth season. The Raiders improved upon their 4-12 record from [[2007 Oakland Raiders season|2007]]. This was also be the first time in 4 seasons that the team did not play both contestants from the previous [[Super Bowl]]. In which case they played the [[New England Patriots]], but not the [[New York Giants]]. This was also the first time in 6 seasons the club did not finish 4th in their division, but 3rd instead.
